quests.name: Shadows on the Wall
objectives: Make your way into Skull rock with The Forgotten.
Talk to The Forgotten.

Explore Skull Rock.
  ‧ Meet with The Forgotten when ready.
Investigate Skull Rock for more clues.

Talk to The Forgotten.
  ‧ Catch the 3 Pixie Dust Orbs in the Village.

Gather resources to repair the Broken Lanterns.
  ‧ 3 Broken Lanterns in Skull Rock.
  ‧ 3 Gold Ingots.
  ‧ 9 Glass.
  ‧ 9 Vitalys Crystal.
Repair the 3 Broken Lanterns at a Crafting Station.
Place the 3 Pixie Dust Lanterns on all three Rope Winches in Skull Rock.
Look for the strange shadow using the Pixie Dust Lanterns'.

The Shadow appeared for a second!
  ‧ Trap the Shadow in one place using all three Pixie Dust Lanterns together.
Try communicating with the Shadow.
Shine a lantern on the gate to let the Shadow lead the way.
Talk to the Jade Skulls.
Complete the Jade Skull riddles.

A wheel near the gate appeared!
  ‧ Turn the wheel to open the wooden gate

quests.name: A Ship of Gold
objectives: Follow the Shadow and The Forgotten further into Skull Rock.
Search the area for a way to continue through Skull Rock.
Talk to The Forgotten.

Another Pixie Dust Orb was released!
  ‧ Follow the Pixie Dust Orb in Skull Rock.
  ‧ Gather the 6 Pixie Dust.
  ‧ Follow the Pixie Dust Orb around Skull Rock.
  ‧ Catch the Pixie Dust Orb.
  ‧ Gather the 6 Pixie Dust.
Use the Pixie Dust to make something fly in Skull Rock.

The ship is flying!
  ‧ Cross to the other side of Skull Rock.
Talk to The Forgotten across the ship in Skull Rock.
(optional) Ask the Jade Skulls for clues.

Solve the Skull Rock barrel puzzle:
  ‧ Match the first pair of symbols.
  ‧ Match the second pair of symbols.
  ‧ Match the third pair of symbols.
Find the key to the Captain's Cabin.

Open the second gate in Skull Rock.
  ‧ Investigate the Captain's Cabin for another Rope Winch.

quests.name: The Music's on the Walls
objectives: Follow The Forgotten and the Shadow in Skull Rock.
Talk to The Forgotten

Investigate inside Skull Rock for clues to find more Glowing Musical Notes.
  ‧ Pick up the Memory found in Skull Rock.
  ‧ Unlock an search the Captain's Chest.
Return to The Forgotten to discuss the Pirate Map and the new Memory.

Use the Pirate Map and the Memory' from your Collection Menu to find:
  ‧ Buried pirate treasure.
  ‧ 5 Glowing Musical Note.
Return to Skull Rock with the Glowing Musical Notes' and Pan Flute.

Make sure you have in your Inventory:
  ‧ 5 Glowing Musical Note.
  ‧ Pan Flute.
Return to The Forgotten with the Glowing Musical Notes' and Pan Flute.
Place the Pan Flute and Glowing Musical Notes' on top of the music stand in Skull Rock.

Play the complete score by using the notes on:
  ‧ The left side of the music wall.
  ‧ The right side of the music wall.
Activate the Pan Flute.

Oh no! The shadow is playing games with us!
  ‧ Talk to The Forgotten.

The Shadow moved the musical notes around on the wall!
  ‧ Find a way to trap the Shadow in one place.
  ‧ Redo the left side of the music wall.
  ‧ Redo the right side of the music wall.
Activate the Pan Flute again.
It's Peter Pan! Talk to him.

Play hide-and-seek with Peter Pan.
  ‧ Talk to The Forgotten.

Find Peter Pan's hiding spot somewhere in the Valley.
  ‧ (optional) Ask any good hide-and-seekers for clues.
  ‧ (optional) Follow Peter Pan's Pixie Dust trail.
Enter the Dark Castle to search for Peter Pan.

That looks like a Pixie Dust trail.
  ‧ Follow it to find Peter Pan.

You found him!
  ‧ Talk to Peter Pan.
Place Peter Pan's House in the Valley.
Unlock Peter Pan's House using the Scrooge McDuck Sign.
Welcome Peter Pan.
Talk to Peter Pan.
Return to The Forgotten.

spoilers.title: Glowing Musical Note #1
spoilers.objective: Inside the Dreamscape (through the treehouse in the Forgotten Lands)

spoilers.title: Glowing Musical Note #3
spoilers.objective: Inside the Secret Chamber in the Frosted Heights, frozen inside a block of ice

spoilers.title: Glowing Musical Note #4
spoilers.objective: Inside the Cursed Cave on Dazzle Beach, found when fishing in a gold pool.

spoilers.title: Glowing Musical Note #5
spoilers.objective: Inside Skull Rock, after solving a riddle from the Jade Skulls (The answer is Pixie dust)
